td.content: s:pt presents with mild heart burn. patient also reports mild burning pain in the middle of the chest that usually occurs after eating or when lying down, mild nausea. he is a 52 year old white m usher. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 76 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Heart = S1 and S2, no murmurs a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed RANITIDINE - 150 mg po bid x 4 weeks, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:a 53 year old male usher presents with severe regurgitation, moderate heart burn. he has history of moderate retrosternal chest pain. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 75.7 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:pt with C/O moderate retrosternal chest pain, severe regurgitation and moderate heart burn. he is a white m aged 53 ys. o:Height 165 cm, Weight 75.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, endoscopy inflamed swollen vocal cards, grade-2 esophagitis, Mouth= Enamel erosions a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered endoscopy.
